title: Air pollution (PM2.5) and its meteorology predictors in Kampala and Jinja cities, in Uganda
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, 4,1145-1156
DOI: 10.1039/D4EA00074A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Aishat Jumoke Alaran, Natasha O'Sullivan, Lambed Tatah, Richard Sserunjogi, Gabriel Okello
This study contributes insights into the air quality challenges faced by two rapidly urbanising cities in Uganda and lays the groundwork for informed decision-making to protect public health and promote a sustainable environment.
